response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence and functionality. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe its value exceeds $15,000. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $18,000. This exclusive opportunity allows you to experience the unparalleled quality and craftsmanship firsthand. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your standards with our top-tier solution. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 18000}
